item.description:
Are you a guy? Do you like thousands of fit women?

Columbus Day and the Tufts 10K for Women is approaching fast! TMIRCE has "Manned" the final water stop for the past three years while donning Tuxedos and fine Italian Suits. Many Kisses ensued.

TMIRCE Ladies are welcome too! Guys, get dressed up.

TMIRCE gets a check donated to the club for volunteers!

The Details (Tux's optional but recommended. Shirts and ties are ok too)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Volunteer check in:

Captian and Assistant Captain - 9:00am at the corner of Beacon St. and Charles St. (the public garden side)

All other Vols, 10:00 - 10:30am. See below

View Tufts 10k Volunteer info in the Large Map

TMIRCE water site located at:


View Tufts 10k volunteer day in a larger map

Commonwealth Ave., between Fairfield and Glouscter St..

Some feedback from the race

"The women love you guys! They always ask if those Tuxedoed Men will be handing out water again." Tufts 10k volunteer coordinator "I ran the first 5 miles just to see the guys in Tux's." Tufts 10k finisher

Please RSVP here. We are looking for 12-15 volunteers for Monday October 8th.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Calling all Guys. Tufts 10K for Women! Volunteer with TMIRCE
